## Repository.hardDeleteManyById() method

Delete a document by its ID (hard)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hardDeleteManyById(ids: MongoIdExt[]): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ids | MongoIdExt\[\] | An array of doc id |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;


## Remarks

It removes docs from the DB, still prefer a soft deletion [Repository.deleteManyById()](./subito-connector-mongodb.repository.deletemanybyid.md)
